caption: Respond to the tribunal
textInputLabel: What's your response to the tribunal?
textInputHint: Use this box to respond or you can upload material at the next step.
radioButtonHint: Do you have any supporting material you want to provide?

hasSupportingMaterial.required: Tell us if you also want to upload supporting material?

responseText.required: Provide details of your response &/or upload supporting material
responseText.requiredFile: Provide details of your response &/or upload a file
responseText.tooLong: Response details must be 2500 characters or less additional details can be uploaded using the support material option
